title: Build Sequence: PRD-001 (Part 8 of 8)
buildPhilosophy: Generated using vertical-slice strategy. Each FBS represents a testable, deployable increment.

buildSequence.title: Notification Center System
buildSequence.summary: Delivers a comprehensive notification center with centralized notification management, read/unread status tracking, and dismissal functionality. Provides unified interface for all system notifications including follow-ups, job matches, and scraping status updates.
testableOutcomes: Notification center icon is clearly visible on main dashboard page with unread count badge
Notification center displays chronological list of all notifications ordered by most recent first
Empty state message appears when user has no notifications available
New notifications display with visual unread indicator until clicked
Clicking notification automatically marks it as read with visual state change
Dismiss button removes notification from list permanently across page refreshes
Dismissed notifications do not reappear when notification center is revisited
buildSequence.implementationNotes: Design scalable notification architecture to handle multiple notification types. Implement efficient read/unread state management with real-time updates. Consider pagination for large notification lists.

buildSequence.title: Deadline & Notification Management
buildSequence.summary: Implements automated deadline tracking and notification generation for job applications, follow-up reminders, job matches, and scraping status updates. Provides comprehensive notification delivery for all time-sensitive job search activities.
testableOutcomes: Follow-up reminder notifications appear in notification center when reminder time arrives
Reminder notifications include job title, company name, and specific reminder message
New job match notifications are created when jobs exceed user's match threshold
Job match notifications display job title, company, match score, and link to job details
No notifications are created for jobs below user's match threshold
Scraping completion notifications show timestamp and total number of new jobs discovered
Scraping error notifications include error type and suggested next steps
Deadline notifications are created for jobs with deadlines within 3 days
Deadline notifications display job title, company, exact deadline date, and days remaining
No deadline notifications are created for jobs with passed deadlines

deliverables: Enhanced notification-manager.ts with all notification types
Database migration for notification_types and deadline_tracking tables

buildSequence.implementationNotes: Integrate with existing workflow orchestration for automated notification generation. Implement efficient deadline checking to avoid performance issues. Ensure notification deduplication to prevent spam.

buildSequence.title: Notification Preferences & Persistence
buildSequence.summary: Implements user notification preferences management with granular control over notification types and ensures notifications persist until explicitly dismissed by the user. Provides settings interface for configuring follow-up reminders, job matches, scraping status, and deadline notifications.
testableOutcomes: Notification preferences page displays toggle options for follow-up reminders, new matched jobs, scraping status, and deadline notifications
System creates no follow-up reminder notifications when user has disabled follow-up reminder preference
System creates no new job match notifications when user has disabled new matched job preference
System creates no scraping status notifications when user has disabled scraping status preference
System creates no deadline notifications when user has disabled deadline notification preference
Notification preference changes are persisted to database and applied to future notifications immediately
All undismissed notifications remain visible after user logout and login cycle
Notifications from previous days remain visible in notification center until explicitly dismissed
Read but undismissed notifications remain present and marked as read in notification center
Undismissed notifications are synchronized and visible when accessing from different devices
buildSequence.implementationNotes: Requires integration with existing notification system and user profile service. Must ensure preference changes are applied retroactively to existing notification generation logic. Cross-device synchronization depends on user authentication state.
